Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A blackened damascus sabre. Designed to be lightweight and swift, enabling quick and fluid movements in combat, the single-edged blade is known for its versatility and effectiveness in both cutting and thrusting. Between the blade and hilt is a S-shape guard, to protect the hand and provide leverage during parrying maneuvers. The leather-wrapped ebony grip allows for a firm hold. The pommel, located at the bottom of the hilt, serves to balance the sword. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, the pommel features a fierce and commanding representation of a wolf's head. Upon closer inspection you notice to its eyes are beset with two gemstones.
